title: Create comprehensive sign-up page with profile information fields

requirements.text: Create a new SignUpPage component that users navigate to when clicking the Get Started button on the landing page

quotes: When get started is clicked it goes to a sign up page

acceptanceCriteria: SignUpPage component exists in frontend/src/pages/
Route is configured in App.tsx to navigate to sign-up page
Get Started button on LandingPage navigates to the sign-up route

requirements.text: Add age input field to the sign-up form with numeric validation
acceptanceCriteria: Age field accepts numeric input only
Field is clearly labeled
Validation ensures reasonable age range (e.g., 18-100)

requirements.text: Add handicap input field to the sign-up form with numeric validation for golf handicap range
acceptanceCriteria: Handicap field accepts numeric input
Field validates golf handicap range (typically -10 to 54)
Field is clearly labeled with golf terminology

requirements.text: Add gender selection field with options for male, female, or couple

quotes: if your male, female or a couple

acceptanceCriteria: Selection control (radio buttons or dropdown) includes male, female, and couple options
Only one option can be selected at a time
Field is required before form submission

requirements.text: Add seeking preference field with options for male, female, or couple to indicate what type of match the user is looking for

quotes: seaking a male female or couple

acceptanceCriteria: Selection control includes options: male, female, couple
User can select what type of match they are seeking
Field is clearly labeled to distinguish from gender field

requirements.text: Add bio textarea field where users can describe their likes, dislikes, themselves, and their ideal golf partner

quotes: likes and dislikes in a bio area where you tell about your self and ideal pair

acceptanceCriteria: Multi-line textarea allows extended text input
Field includes placeholder text or label guiding users to share likes, dislikes, and ideal match description
Character limit is reasonable (e.g., 500-1000 characters)

requirements.text: Add location input section to the sign-up form for capturing user's geographical location
acceptanceCriteria: Location input field accepts address or coordinates
Field is clearly labeled
Input validates location format

requirements.text: Add home course input section to the sign-up form where users can specify their primary golf course
acceptanceCriteria: Home course field accepts text input for course name
Field is clearly labeled as home course
Field allows users to identify their regular golf course

requirements.text: Add profile photo upload option to the sign-up form allowing users to upload an image file
acceptanceCriteria: File input control allows image file selection
Supported formats include common image types (JPEG, PNG)
Preview of selected image is displayed before submission
File size validation prevents oversized uploads

requirements.text: Apply golf-themed styling to the sign-up page consistent with the existing visual design system using golf-inspired colors, typography, and layout patterns

quotes: all with a golf theme to the page

acceptanceCriteria: Page uses golf-themed color palette from existing design system (fairway green, sand tan, grass green)
Layout and component styling matches existing page patterns
Visual elements evoke golf and outdoor sporting elegance
All form components use shadcn/ui components for consistency

requirements.text: Update backend UserProfile type to include age field as Nat (natural number)
acceptanceCriteria: UserProfile type in backend/main.mo includes age: Nat field
Existing profile creation and update functions handle age field
Age is persisted and retrievable

requirements.text: Update backend UserProfile type to include lookingFor field matching the Gender type (Male, Female, Couple)

quotes: seaking a male female or couple

acceptanceCriteria: UserProfile type includes lookingFor field of Gender type
Field stores user's preference for match type
Existing profile operations handle lookingFor field

requirements.text: Update backend UserProfile type to include homeCourse field as Text for storing user's primary golf course name
acceptanceCriteria: UserProfile type includes homeCourse: Text field
Field stores course name as provided by user
Profile operations handle homeCourse field

requirements.text: Update backend UserProfile type to include profilePhoto field as ?Blob for storing uploaded profile image data
acceptanceCriteria: UserProfile type includes profilePhoto: ?Blob field for optional image data
Backend can store and retrieve profile photos
Photo data is accessible via query functions

requirements.text: Create backend function to save complete user profile including all new fields (age, lookingFor, homeCourse, profilePhoto) when sign-up form is submitted
acceptanceCriteria: Update or create profile mutation accepts all new fields
Profile data is validated and stored in stable storage
Function returns success confirmation or error

requirements.text: Wire sign-up form submission to backend profile creation with validation and error handling
acceptanceCriteria: Form submission calls backend profile creation mutation
All required fields are validated before submission
Success state navigates user to main application
Error states display helpful messages to user
Loading states provide feedback during submission

constraints: Maintain single-actor backend architecture in backend/main.mo

Do not modify immutable frontend paths: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui
Use existing Gender type from backend/main.mo for gender and lookingFor fields
nonGoals: Geolocation API integration for automatic location detection
